duties_responsibilities.duty: Assess client needs and plan/link to appropriate services.
Provide outreach and engagement for community programs.
Coordinate and provide services within a recovery-oriented system of care.
Advocate for clients and provide support in achieving overall wellness and independent functioning.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in mental health or human service discipline preferred, or Associates degree with minimum 2 years of experience.
Requires current, valid Connecticut driver’s license. Must qualify for Public Service License.
Previous work experience with individuals with severe and persistent mental illness, preferred.
